availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: P. M. Ellison (Calloway Co Ct. Clerk)

body.p: Calloway County, Kentucky, court official. Clerk of the Calloway Circuit Court in 1850. Clerk of the Calloway County Court in 1850, 1851, and 1860.

ab.bibl: Reports Communicated to Both Branches of the Legislature of Kentucky at the November Session, 1850 (Frankfort: A. G. Hodges, 1850), Document No. 15, 428. _Reports Communicated to Both Branches of the General Assembly of Kentucky, at the November Session, 1851 (Frankfort: A. G. Hodges, 1851), Document No. 15, 548. KYR-0001-017-0011.
